member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Core.WinForms.ControlExtensions.InvokeIfNeeded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Action,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method will execute the action on a different thread. This may cause a race condition.

member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Core.WinForms.ControlExtensions.InvokeIfNeededAndWait(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Action,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method will execute the action and will wait for it to complete before returning. This is needed to make sure this action is complete before moving onto the next action. This addresses a race condition that can occur if using the other/original method.
